Vehicles of various types, including cars and buses, are scattered across the street, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings lining the street are adorned with billboards and advertisements, adding to the city's commercial vibrancy. 

The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. This suggests that the photo was taken during the day under a sunny sky. Overall, the image provides a snapshot of a typical day in Beijing, showcasing the city's dynamic street life and architectural charm.
